page.title: 15Puppet Making
page.content: In the Summer Term of 1985,Great Horwood School enjoyed a presentation of puppets by Glenda Ramsay.Two puppet shows were followed by puppet workshops. The whole school took part in the making of puppets, which ranged from rod and glove puppets to shadow puppets. Many children grouped together and wrote their own plays or adapted fairy stories.These performances were presented to their class or the rest of the school and were greatly appreciated. Puppet making workshops were held in the school hall and as many as sixty children took part during the lunch break.The children were able to select from a mountain of plastic pots,boxes, cartons and pieces of material with which they could make their puppets.
